movie.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movie.actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Michael Gambon, Dave Legeno, Elarica Johnson
movie.plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 33 nominations.
